17#ifndef _LIBDM_KDEV_H
18#define _LIBDM_KDEV_H
19
20#define MAJOR(dev) ((dev & 0xfff00) >> 8)
21#define MINOR(dev) ((dev & 0xff) | ((dev >> 12) & 0xfff00))
22#define MKDEV(ma,mi) ((mi & 0xff) | (ma << 8) | ((mi & ~0xff) << 12))
23
24#endif
25
